name: NOTE_FREE_TEXT
description: The NOTE_FREE_TEXT table contains free text notes.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the note record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: NOTE_FREE_TEXT
columns.description: This columns contains the free text contents of a plain-text note.
